title: Japan makes history with tense, successful moon landing
summary: Japan's SLIM “Moon Sniper” spacecraft made a successful lunar landing Friday, making the country just the fifth to robotically land on the moon.

title: NASA report offers pessimistic take on space-based solar power
summary: Advocates of space-based solar power are criticizing a NASA report that offered a skeptical assessment of that technology’s ability to provide low-cost green energy.

title: NASA study: clean, space-based solar power beaming is possible
summary: With commitment and investment, space-based solar power could become feasible and help reduce the world's carbon emissions.

title: Japan announces successful SLIM lunar landing, fifth country to reach moon’s surface
summary: Japan staked its claim as a national space power on Friday, as its SLIM spacecraft successfully landed on the lunar surface.

title: China’s Landspace conducts first VTVL test for reusable stainless steel rocket
summary: Chinese launch startup Landspace executed a first vertical takeoff, vertical landing with a test article Friday at a launch and recovery site at Jiuquan spaceport.
